selectedHandTile - Variable in class com.aaronmreyes.scrabble.core.Player
 
setCreator(String) - Method in class com.aaronmreyes.scrabble.core.tiles.AbstractTile
This method allows for the Game to set the visibility of a given tile once a player plays a tile from their hand.
setLocation(Location) - Method in class com.aaronmreyes.scrabble.core.tiles.AbstractTile
This method allows for Game class to set the location of a tile once it is taken from the player's hand and placed on the board.
setStartingPlayer(String) - Method in class com.aaronmreyes.scrabble.core.Game
The method used to set the starting player of the game.
setupGame(List<String>, boolean) - Method in class com.aaronmreyes.scrabble.core.Game
The method used to set up/restart a game.
showDialog(Component, String, String) - Static method in class com.aaronmreyes.scrabble.Main
A simple method used to display a notification to the user
StealWordTile - Class in com.aaronmreyes.scrabble.core.tiles
Steal-a-word: The player who activates this tile does not gain any points.
StealWordTile(char, int, Location, AbstractTile.color) - Constructor for class com.aaronmreyes.scrabble.core.tiles.StealWordTile
